name: Basilica of Bom Jesus
column5: famous for its Baroque architecture and the mortal remains of St. Francis Xavier.

name: Se Cathedral
description: One of the largest churches in Asia
column5: famous for its Portuguese-Manueline style architecture and the Golden Bell

name: Shri Mangesh Temple
description: A Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva
column5: known for its beautiful location amidst lush green hills and serene atmosphere.

name: Fort Aguada
description: A 17th century Portuguese fort with a lighthouse
column5: offering breathtaking views of the Arabian Sea.

name: Chapora Fort
description: A 16th century fort famous for its panoramic views of the Vagator Beach and the Chapora River.

name: Reis Magos Fort
description: A 16th century fort with a museum showcasing the history and culture of Goa.

name: Ancestral Goa
description: An open-air museum showcasing the traditional Goan way of life
